    • contains

      @Deprecated public static boolean contains(ReplicationPeerConfig peerConfig, TableName tableName)
      Deprecated.
      Will be removed in HBase 3. Use ReplicationPeerConfig.needToReplicate(TableName) instead.
      Parameters:
      peerConfig - configuration for the replication peer cluster
      tableName - name of the table
      Returns:
      true if the table need replicate to the peer cluster
